1.content:
Background: The shrink ray was invented eight years ago and was praised for its ability to end world hunger and overpopulation. People who committed serious crimes were shrunk to make them more manageable, and the same practice was applied to individuals who became government dependents. Eventually the number of shrinks became large enough that laws had to be written addressing there place in society. Deemed by many to be a drain on the government many of the laws made shrinks legal property and transferred their "management" to private companies. Fallowing a supreme court judgement shrunken people were declared vermin sharing the same rights as mice, cockroaches, and rats. The companies that now owned these "people" started using them to form a new industry. These new "shrink" products became very popular. Now anyone can purchase as many shrinks as they want, and use them for all kinds of uses.

         Marketing: Shrunken people are sold to normal people for whatever use they want. Shrunken people are easily replaced and can be purchased as ether singles or packages. A package is usually the same age, race, gender, and training level for all the shrinks inside. All Shrinks are given basic training/processing before they are sold, which gets them thin and in shape. Special training including obedience, emotion control, and special skills are available as specialized packages. Other specialized packs include overweight shrinks who are specially fattened, Families who are shrunk and sold together, and willing victims who actually want to be used abused and/or killed without special training.

         Perspective: The story can follow ether a shrunken person or a normal consumer.
1.title: Perspective

11.content:
Decide how old the male shrink is.

         More Information: Males shrinks are considered expendable, are more durable then females, and have limited breeding demand. Because of these facts male shrinks are cheaper then females and used more loosely and recklessly.

         Advertisement: If you need to unclog a kitchen drain why not use a male shrink? They are tough, and cheap enough that you don't need to fish them out. Just turn on the garbage disposal and wash the clog away with the plumber! Male shrinks are available anywhere shrinks are sold; buy yours today!
11.title: Male Shrink Ages

111.content:
how old is the shrunken boy?

For this reason these shrinks are plentiful, cheap, and happy to interact with their owner(s). Singles are available but do to the high numbers of these shrinks package size can be as large as fifty Shrinks!

         Option 1 â€“ Katsuâ€™s shrink batch is six years old, male, african, given a designation by random name generation; the batch consists of 100 individuals. This batch did not receive any hands on training but did receive basic language training by computer. The batch was raised in a single large room with only their basic needs administered to. Katsu specifically likes the giants who come around occasionally; he thinks they are scary but also really impressive.

         Option 2 â€“ Wolf's shrink batch is seven years old, male, caucasian, and undesignated; the batch started with a thousand and now consists of 890 individuals. The training program for this batch focused on total obedience of normal people. The shrinks were put though group exercises each day and punished for both noncompliance and slow reaction. Wolf originally thought of himself with the dayly group name, slave(s), pet(s), toy(s), insect(s), however he like many of the other boys eventually decided on a secret name for himself. Wolf knows how cruel life can be for a shrink but until now he has never done anything without a group.

         Option 3 â€“ Quefourâ€™s shrink batch is eight years old, male, asian (primarily japanese), and designated by a letter and a number; they are 260 in total. The training program for this batch included learning to obey, trust, and like normal people. The shrinks were encouraged to be cheerful, and energetic with lots of their training being in the form of games. Quefour has no idea what life can be like for a shrink but he does have more training going for him than most captive bred shrinks.

         âWellâ started Moon âAlum heard one of the instructors say we are going to be called for a special meeting later.â

         âWhat aboutâ asked Wolf as he walked to the drying room.

         With the noise of the air blowing Moon had to shout âHe didnât say, but the instructors are really excited about it.â Moon shook his head in front of the outlet and let the hot air push away the water before continuing. âAnyway today you have speaking training again right?â

         Speaking training consisted of memorizing words and repeating phrases. The instructor would assign each boy a name that they must call the instructor by. Than they would so the boys pictures and the boys had to say what the image was of or if it was a new image repeat whatever the instructor said it was. âYes big brother that is an Okapi and its ilke.â Wolf answered when his turn came. A little later another boy answered incorrectly and Wolf watched as the boy was poked with the instructorâs electric wand. The boy screamed on the ground for a second before getting back up and joining the line. Not getting up quickly could get you shocked again after all.

         âNow all you toys go to the meeting area and wait.â The instructor ordered before moving away from the table the boys were on.

         Wolf ran across the walk between tables to the big table where all the boys were gathered for announcements from time to time. Wolf noticed large boxes near the edge of the table and wondered what was going on as several instructors approached the table.

         âLine up toys and get ready to be grouped.â The female instructor said as she looked at her clipboard. âFirst three toys in this box, twenty toys in this box, one toy in this box.â How will Wolf be packaged?

         Option 1: In a small box alone

         Option 2:In a large box with several others.
1112.title: Wolf: Shipping

choices: The box is opened by an instructor
11121.content:
Before Wolf could make up his mind to move with the others, he found himself trailing behind the group that was now being quickly hustled into each box. He watched as Alum, Set and Mali ended up bunched together in the first box and hustled along as the rest of the boys began to fill up the next box.

"You, stop." The commanding voice of an instructor held Wolf in place.

Looking up the woman's imposing figure, he felt a shudder of fear as his friends looked back at him from inside the box. Moon seemed the most distraught as his forehead furrowed, giving him an almost anxious look.

"Get inside," he heard her say as the huge electric rod came closer.

Not wanting to be shocked, Wolf immediately jumped into the empty box she was directing him to, only to find himself unable to even see his friends off as the woman's gigantic fingers deftly put the lid on his box.

He could not describe his feelings, although a sense of anguish filled his heart as he sat down in the darkness, alone for the first time ever in his memory. He felt the ground shift beneath him but beyond the darkness, he could not tell what was waiting for him.
11121.title: Wolf: Alone for the First Time

111211.content:
Minutes ticked away as Wolf huddled in the darkness. The world he had known all his young life had been a hard, almost cruel reality. Yet, it was all that he had known and all he knew now was what he had been taught. To obey, to serve and never to question.

Still he wished that things could be different. Many a time he longed to be recognised by one of the instructors, the godlike beings that watched over him daily. In particular, the female only one, with her dark hair and dark eyes, for whom he would do anything, not just because he was supposed to but because he wished she would touch him. He could not explain this urge, only that among them all she was different.

At times, he even wished that she would take him away with her and now that she had singled him out, he could only hope that she would be the one to open his box.

A sudden jolt sent a shock through the ground, causing him to tumble away to the side and hit one of the walls of the box. Outside, he could hear the reverberating voices of his instructors and he listened intently for her voice.

"Yes, we hope you will be satisfied with your order. They have been instructed as you asked and will do anything you say," he heard the woman instructor say.

"Very good. My last batch was a letdown. Especially the one," came another voice. A strange voice that he had never heard before.

"Well, I am sure you will find this batch up to your expectations. Now if you would kindly pay the amount written here...." came the voice of another instructor.

As he tuned his senses to hear more of the new voice, a strange smell filled his box. In moments, he found himself falling asleep. Even in the darkness, his head was spinning and the last he heard was the sound of their voices disappearing into darkness.
111211.title: Wolf: Sold

Paul: A fit young elementary school jock, of Caucasian descent. He and his older brother were seized from his parents after they failed to pay the returns on their mortgage. Ben was taken away kicking and screaming to be processed and sent to a local distributor. I'm rebooting to try and get myself interested again in this interactive. I will also be testing a style with short chapters, chapter names which help make the overview screen easier to use, and a sloppy attempt at learning perspective. I hope you enjoy this project, which will revolve around people being shrunk and used similarly to allot of interactive stories. The story is broken up by gender and age. If you are feeling more voracious than stop by "Shrunken People a Menu Item"; which supports significantly more vore. Any similarity with other stories is a coincidence based off similar subjects and is not intentional. Thank you for understanding.

A few base rules
1. Do Not Judge - this is meant for fun so I do not intend to spend time correcting my many grammatical and spelling errors <No punctuation. "gasp!"
2. No Real People - please keep all the characters purely fictional.
         2a. Please do not refer to characters using second person pronouns "You, Your, Yours" except where one character refers to another.
         2b. As most of you already know, celebrities are real people.
3. Keep It Interesting - chapters need at least two sentences. Try and keep chapters short in this one to move the action forward quickly.
         3a. Please fill chapter options out.
